title: The Magical Christmas Store
description: Celebrate the joy of love, family, and the magic of Christmas with this touching story about the most important gifts that money can't buy.Christmas for Benji this year has lost its magic. He desperately wants to feel the joy of this special season, but his family has very little. He is out walking in the city on Christmas Eve when he stumbles upon a magnificent store. A polar bear invites him in, and Benji visits different rooms that are filled with silly sounds, invisible items that appear using oneâ€™s imagination, and wonderful, inviting smells. Will he be able to find the perfect Christmas gifts for his family?
author: Maudie Powell-Tuck
